html:
10.11.18  4:21 am   You didn't answer any questions today.

     that's not true

      Were they all crap

     no

10.11.18  3:57 am   I think I might've half-consciously limited my thought process growing up, and now I'm slowly rediscovering how my brain really works. Has this ever happened to you?

     yes

10.11.18  1:51 am   Bill, are you happy right now? These songs you've been putting out are just fantastic and they seem pretty upbeat, but I know that some of the most upbeat songs can hide a dark truth about the creator. Is that your case?

     not really

      Do these songs fulfill your spirit?

     that's the objective

      What aspirations remain for you?

     do it more and better

10.11.18  1:45 am   Every time I see someone playing ukulele picking style they are always using their thumb to play the strings but I have more of a "bassist" aproach to it coz I use primarily my index finger but also my other ones. Do you think this is bad?

     no

      Is it proper technique to play it with your thumb?

     the entire ukulele is improper in the first place

      Am I a heathen?

     i don't know what that is

      Should I switch techniques.

     could be fun

      K thx :)

10.11.18  1:03 am   favorite daft punk song?

     one more time

10.11.18  12:53 am   these days i never want to do anything. even the fun things. i feel so unproductive and i hate it. i just sit around all day like the lazy piece of crap that i am. how do i stop this ...............

     start by lifting a finger, then at some point when you are ready you could go ahead and lift that second finger

10.11.18  12:16 am   what are your thoughts right now?

     i'm in trouble

10.10.18  11:28 pm   How many times do you?

     still doing more

10.10.18  10:18 pm   you might be the only person on the planet who watches bob ross for the subtext of panic and madness. anything else we can apply this train of thought to? 

     how about this

10.10.18  10:09 pm   if people are meant to take meaning out of things then why do people get so mad if that meaning wasn't meant to be there??

     meaning is everywhere. you will never escape from it

10.10.18  10:07 pm   If you saw some people walking in a group whistling down the street and harmonising with each other, what would you do?

     that depends what i was doing before and what i was already gonna do

10.10.18  9:57 pm   Ey man

I SAID EY MAN

Wanna buy some CD's?

     i don't have a player

10.10.18  9:48 pm   can you make a song about me?

     all my songs are about you

10.10.18  9:34 pm   how can you tell what things are bad things??

     everything is bad

10.10.18  9:20 pm   is light even considered as a color?

     it's all the colors

10.10.18  8:51 pm   how do i know if a melody I think I wrote is actually original?

     ask everyone you know

     does it even matter?

     try not to copy something that you know only 1 person has written before. and as a side note, never use any of the same notes, tempos, or instruments that marvin gaye has ever used

10.10.18  8:19 pm   how do you feel about the questions submitted to the questions page that aren't really questions

     good, fine

10.10.18  7:37 pm   how does i grammar gooder

     buy a grammar kit

10.10.18  7:00 pm   If you ever held a concert, which of your songs would you open and close with (respectively)?

     i can't tell you

10.10.18  6:13 pm   If it only took you three days to do the research for History of Japan, why did it take over a week to construct the script? What part of the script-making process made it take a that long?

     i was doing research the entire time while writing it

10.10.18  5:58 pm   how long do you plan to do the 2 week cycle

     at least a year

10.10.18  5:57 pm   think you would be able to work out arrangements for your hit songs with a live band consisting of two keyboards (one piano + one for synth), guitar, bass, drums, and sax? i think that would sound really good in a concert hall. you're just on the mic. video style.

     similar but i'd prefer only 1 keyboard, need trumpet in addition to sax, 3 backup singers, and 1 aux perc

10.10.18  4:26 pm   Hey bill, I think I found the key to happiness.  Well, its not really the key to happiness as much as the key to becoming happy.   Its a 5 step plan.   1. Find something that makes you happy.   2. Do said thing.   3. If you get tired of original thing, find something new before you get completely burnt out.   4. Do said new thing plus occasionally go back to old thing(s).   5. Repeat steps 1-5.    What do you think?

     that's good but you're gonna need another list once you get tired of that list

10.10.18  4:14 pm   Do the symbols at the end of Mount Saint Helens is about to Blow Up translate to anything.   Aka, is there some kind of secret message in them?

     the message is holy crap there's not much time left before this thing is due

10.10.18  4:10 pm   How do you figure out how you want the video to look. For example, in "i'm Best Friends with my Own Front Door" at about 0:19 to 0:22 what gave you the idea to have a man walk on the door, and then turn into an apple that then falls down.

     might not be a man but it is a person. that section would be difficult because it's instrumental. there are no lyrics to guide or suggest any imagery. i guess just try to put yourself in my situation and imagine you have the audio song but no video. and think of that brief instrumental riff, and what does it make you think of? to me that's exactly what it made me think of. although now you probably think of that too, regardless of what you would have thought of without seeing the video because now you have seen the video

10.10.18  3:44 pm   Was there anything in particular you were trying to express in "i can play".   If so, what were you trying express in the song "i can play"?

     freedom

10.10.18  3:08 pm   Is it time?

     yes

10.10.18  2:55 pm   what do you think about rap songs?

     scientists believe a song must have at least 71% rap to be considered a rap song

10.10.18  2:16 pm   Why is why?

     that sounds about right

10.10.18  1:46 pm   have you found my dad?

     soon it will be you

10.10.18  1:10 pm   would you like to get some rest right about now or maybe a cool drink?

     yes

10.10.18  11:48 am   why am i so quiet? i was with a group of people today and they were all talking and being happy and i wanted to join in the conversation but i just couldn't. the best i could do was just listen and smile and nod. i usually dont mind being quiet but sometimes i feel like i'm missing out. what's wrong with me? why can't i just speak?

     perhaps you are plotting something outrageous

10.10.18  11:35 am   who's eating dirt in "eat dirt?"

     the customer

10.10.18  10:51 am   Why are almost all of your lyrics full sentences? It's very unusual.

     i didn't notice

10.10.18  9:55 am   What's ur opnion on knifes?

     sometimes i can't believe how sharp they are

10.10.18  9:39 am   Do you enjoy the fact that this questions page helps you keep up with all of the latest memes?

      i am thankful and grateful

10.10.18  9:25 am   help i have an alarm and it's just this loud high pitched jingle type thing and it was waking me up fine for a few weeks but lately i've like, i guess because i have a habit of falling asleep listening to music, been sort of entering this half sleep state where i'm listening to my alarm like its a song and then resuming sleep, and so it's not really doing its job anymore

     you'll have to turn it louder

10.10.18  9:19 am   How does one find inspiration when one has been feeling uninspired since the past 4(ish) years? :(

     start with a simple game of 'what do we know'

10.10.18  8:38 am   What are ideas?

     anything you can imagine

10.10.18  6:24 am   What's your favorite thing that you've done/made?

     i would prefer to make a new thing to be my favorite

10.10.18  6:18 am   what's new york like? ive never been there

     i've been advised not to say

10.10.18  5:27 am   how good is your relative pitch

     perfect

10.10.18  4:33 am   thoughts on ants?

     small, difficult to see from a distance

10.10.18  3:47 am   what are you dressing up as for halloween?

     chore doer

10.10.18  2:25 am   is it always difficulty to convince other people, for example, your client? or it's just because my idea is not good enough?

     the right idea in the right context will sell itself, but the world runs at many different angles, so persuasion is a fun and useful game to learn

10.10.18  2:05 am   how do you deal with feeling like a failure?

     succeed!

10.10.18  1:54 am   Why do I want to scream 

     could be fun

10.10.18  1:38 am   Why do you think you are a person?

      everything is persons

10.10.18  1:36 am   Do squirrels prefer pinball or horseback riding?

     probably horseback riding

10.10.18  1:35 am   What is the most inconvenient thing you can think of?

     destroying the entire universe
